forum.content:
有人也喜歡Skid Row 嗎
還是你也喜歡80s heavy metal

跟朋友談到Skid row 大家大多都只聽過18andLife , I remember you 這兩首

其實Skid row 還有很多歌值得聽
80s heavy metal是最能換起我搖滾初衷的一種曲風

推薦一首skid row-monkey business

urls.description: Music video by Skid Row performing Monkey Business (C) 1991 Atlantic Records. Official Video Remaste

forum.title: 有人也喜歡SkidRow嗎
